Công ty TNHH Vân Long được thành lập năm: Van Long Plastic Co., Ltd was established in 1999 and is a 100% Vietnamese-owned enterprise specializing in processing and manufacturing plastic products.
Công ty có 2 nhà máy sản xuất với nhiều: The company has 2 manufacturing factories with many modern equipment and a total area of nearly 20,000 m2.Over 20 years of establishment and development, VanLong has now become one of the leading companies in manufacturing andprocessing plastic products in Hai Phong.  With many years of experience in the field of plastic manufacturing, we are now a prestigious partner of leading brands such as LG Electronics, Tohoku Pioneer, Idemitsu,Vinfast , Jx Nippon and Chevron.
Vân Long đã đạt được nhiều danh hiệu, gi: VanLong has won many titles and awards, and currently one of Vietnam’s top 10 plastic industry brands. It is VanLong’s collective effort in committing to our objective of bringing value to both our customers and our community.
Với mức giá cạnh tranh và chất lượng đảm: With competitive prices and guaranteed quality, along with good after-sales service, we believe that our products always create value to help customers achieve high productivity and maximize profits
Với kinh nghiệm sản xuất trên 20 năm, Nh: With over 20 years of production experience, Van Long Plastic confidently affirms that our products have the top quality in the market today. With a product line for agriculture, forestry and fishery that requires durability and long life, we can completely meet.
Với kinh nghiệm làm việc với bà con tại: With the experience of working with people in Quang Ninh province for many years, we regularly improve and launch products of good quality with competitive prices, in order to partially support the initial cost. for growers.
Nhựa Vân Long tin rằng việc bán hàng phả: Van Long Plastic believes that sales must always be associated with customer care. We want to accompany you and support throughout the process of using Van Long's products.
Chúng tôi chuyên cung cấp phân phối các: We specialize in supplying and distributing plastic products for industrial, agricultural, forestry, fishery and civil industries
